doc:
John Aniston https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Aniston 0 John Anthony Aniston (born Giannis Anitios Anastasakis , Greek: Γιάννης Ανήτιος Αναστασάκης, July 24, 1933) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Victor Kiriakis on the NBC daytime drama series Days of Our Lives, which he originated in July 1985 and has played continually since then. He is the father of actress Jennifer Aniston. John_Anthony_Aniston ( born Giannis_Anitios_Anastasakis , Greek : Γιάννης_Ανήτιος_Αναστασάκης , July_24_,_1933 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_role as Victor_Kiriakis on the_NBC_daytime_drama_series_Days of Our_Lives , which he originated in July_1985 and has_played continually_since_then . He is the_father of actress_Jennifer_Aniston .
